Sentencas: Integrated energy systems are known as the most appreciable and high-efficient energy suppliers for addressing the burning issues of energy shortages in the current advanced societies.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: In addition to efficiency augmentation of the basic system with such deliberation, it is highly imperative to design a renewable-based source as the prime mover of such an integrated energy system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: Regarding such a requirement in the nowadays energy sectors, a new hybrid system run by a SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) is suggested in this study.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: To show the possibility of the proposed system, thermodynamics laws are accounted as an advantageous tool for the evaluation of the proposed hybrid system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: The outcomes exhibit that the introduced trigeneration system generates heating load, net electricity, and distilled water of 370.2 kW, 1605 kW, and 345.708 kg/h, respectively.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: Based on this scenario, the trigeneration energetic and exergetic efficiencies are computed 85.56% and 63.04%, respectively.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: Additionally, among all elements, the SOFC stack and afterburner are recognized as the most destructive components by 233.3 kW and 173.3 kW, respectively.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units

Sentencas: An exhaustive parametric evaluation is carried out through the study and it is figured out that the main factors of the system can have a maximum point in terms of the fuel utilization factor, desalination flow ratio, and desalination maximum temperature.
Titulo: Energy and exergy evaluation of an innovative hybrid system coupled with HRSG and HDH desalination units
